t.rmrsbankitem: The Bolan Pass is a gap through the Toba Kakar Range of mountains on the border of Pakistan.

In February of 1839, the British Army under Sir John Keane took 12,000 men through the Bolan Pass and entered Kandahar.

t.rmrsbankitem: In 1856 Manuel Ruiz Zorrilla was elected deputy, and soon attracted notice among the most advanced Progressists and Democrats.
